purchase.name: Earn Tokens
purchase.description: Would you like to earn new tokens for free?

purchase.name: Handful of Goodies
purchase.description: This Handful of Goodies holds 20 Tokens. Trade them in for prizes at the market.

purchase.name: Mouthful of Goodies
purchase.description: This Mouthful of Tokens holds 110 Tokens. You get 10 Tokens for free!

purchase.name: Small Bag of Goodies
purchase.description: This Small Bag of Goodies holds 220 Tokens. You get 20 Tokens for free!

purchase.name: Box of Goodies
purchase.description: This Box of Goodies holds 440 Tokens. You get 40 Tokens for free!

purchase.name: Giant Sack of Goodies
purchase.description: This Giant Sack of Goodies holds 1100 Tokens. You get 100 Tokens for free!

purchase.name: Massive Sack of Goodies
purchase.description: This Massive Sack of Goodies holds 2200 Tokens. You get 200 Tokens for free!

purchase.name: Reforge Armor
purchase.description: Accidentally allocated your armor points to the wrong stats? Give yourself another chance.

purchase.name: Reforge Weapon
purchase.description: Accidentally allocated your weapon points to the wrong stats? Give yourself another chance.

purchase.name: Gold Mine
purchase.description: Convert your tokens into solid gold! Current Exchange Rate: 300 Gold for 1 Token.

purchase.name: Amnesia
purchase.description: Wish you could go back and allocate stat points differently? Restore all stat points for one character.

purchase.name: Expanded Sack
purchase.description: Gain additional inventory slots so you can carry more weapons and accessories.

purchase.name: Bread Slice
purchase.description: A slice of bread that increases your team's experience gain by 40%. Lasts for 3 battles.

purchase.name: Bread Loaf
purchase.description: A loaf of bread that increases your team's experience gain by 100%. Lasts for 1 battle.

purchase.name: Breadstick
purchase.description: A special type of bread that increases your team's experience gain by 20%. Lasts for 5 battles.

purchase.name: Weapon Purchase
purchase.description: Purchase an additional weapon for one fighter. Weapons will be showcased here, but actual forging must be done in the weapon shop.

purchase.name: Fresh Booty
purchase.description: Revive all Treasure Nodes and reap the bounty of Gold, Tokens, and Epic items once again.

purchase.name: Character Slot
purchase.description: Add an additional character to your team! Max number of team members is 5.
